impressive_scars.name: Impressive Scars
impressive_scars.fixedeffect:
Increase Cool by 1.

This bonus only applies once, treat all further results as Out Cold.

horrid_scars.name: Horrid Scars
horrid_scars.fixedeffect:
Gain Fearsome skill.

This bonus only applies once, treat all further results as Out Cold.

bitter_emnity.name: Bitter Emnity
bitter_emnity.fixedeffect: When fighting a battle against the gang that inflicted this injury, the fighter gains the Berserker skill. If they already have the Berserker skill or roll this result a second time, treat it as Out Cold.

old_battle_wound.name: Old Battle Wound
old_battle_wound.fixedeffect: At the end of each Battle this fighter participates in roll a D6, on a 1 the fighter.

partially_defeaned.name: Partially Defeaned
partially_defeaned.fixedeffect: The fighter suffers no penalty if they are partially deafened, however, suffering this injury again reduces their Leadership by 1.

multiple_injuries.name: Multiple Injuries
multiple_injuries.fixedeffect: Suffer d3 injuries (ignoring Captured, Multiple Injuries, Memorable Death, Critical Injury, or Out Cold!

captured.name: Captured
captured.fixedeffect: In the wrap-up, test to see if this fighter was captured.

critical_injury.name: Critical Injury
critical_injury.fixedeffect: Get these injuries treated in the Post Battle... or Die!

memorable_death.name: Memorable Death
memorable_death.fixedeffect: Splat! If a fighter directly killed this figher they gain an additional XP
